CustomField.description: The date the hardware is due to lifecycle. The formula refers to a combination of the Acquisition Date and Hardware Type fields.
CustomField.formula: IF ( OR ( HardwareType__c = "Firewall", HardwareType__c = "Network Switch", HardwareType__c = "Phone", HardwareType__c = "Phone Equipment", HardwareType__c = "SAN", HardwareType__c = "SAN Switch", HardwareType__c = "Server Hardware", HardwareType__c = "Storage Array" ), Acquisition_Date__c + 2556, IF ( OR ( HardwareType__c = "Monitor", HardwareType__c = "Server", HardwareType__c = "Workstation" ), Acquisition_Date__c + 1826, IF ( OR ( HardwareType__c = "Docking Station", HardwareType__c = "Laptop" ), Acquisition_Date__c + 1096, null ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The projected lifecycle date of the hardware based on Acquisition Date and Hardware Type.
CustomField.label: Lifecycle Date
